bill.summary:
Help Extend Auditory Relief (HEAR) Act of 2015
Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to cover aural rehabilitation services, hearing aids as durable medical equipment, audiology rehabilitation services, and related hearing services.
